data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Danny Hylton is booked for the home team.
In the minute 20, Adam Davies (Stoke) gets a yellow card.
Luton's Ruddock Pelly has been booked in Luton.
At Kenilworth Road, Danny Batth has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Steven Fletcher is on target to give Stoke a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 55, Goal! Nick Powell extends Stoke's lead to 0-2.
Jacob Brown is replacing Tyrese Campbell for Stoke at Kenilworth Road.
Nathan Jones is making the team's first substitution at Kenilworth Road with Joe Morrell replacing Elliott Lee.
In the minute 67, The home team have replaced Martin Cranie with Jordan Clark. This is the second substitution made today by Nathan Jones.
Michael O'Neill (Stoke) is making a second substitution, with Jordan Thompson replacing Nick Powell.
Nathan Jones is making the team's third substitution at Kenilworth Road with George Moncur replacing Luke Berry.
In the minute 85, Michael O'Neill (Stoke) is making a third substitution, with Lee Gregory replacing Steven Fletcher.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
